name: trans-5-O-(4-coumaroyl)-D-shikimate,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3'-hydroxylating)
definition: 4-Coumaroylshikimate + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 5-O-Caffeoylshikimic acid + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
